name: time
comment: center of averaging period or snapshot instantaneous time

name: time_bnds
long_name: start and end of averaging period

name: time_step
long_name: model time step at end of averaging period or at snapshot [hours since 1992-01-01T12:00:00]
comment: The ECCO V4r4 model has 1 hour timesteps

name: Z
comment: depth at center of model grid cell. non-uniform vertical spacing

name: Z_bnds
long_name: depth bounds of grid cells (depths at top and bottom of grid cells)
comment: identical to model grid depth bounds
